thread.title: United flights grounded by computer problem
thread.title_full: United flights grounded by computer problem

title: United flights grounded by computer problem
text:
United flights grounded by computer problem Extent of problem on international flights not known By Chris Isidore Tweet NEW YORK (CNNMoney) - 
United Airlines flights were grounded Wednesday morning due to a problem with its computer system, the FAA reported. Related Content 10 best romantic getaways 
The extent of the problem and whether it affected flights outside the United States was not immediately known. 
United spokesmen were not available for comment, but the airline's twitter account responded to customer complaints, saying "We are working on getting you to your destination as quickly as possible."
